oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wild bees and pollination
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pfiffner, Lukas
Müller, Andreas
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Animal husbandry
Biodiversity and ecosystem services
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This fact sheet summarizes the current state of academic knowledge on the importance of wild bees in the pollination of wild and cultivated plants. It mentions the known causes for the decline of wild bees, describes the effects of organic farming and lists necessary measures for promotion and protection of wild bees.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Pfiffner, Lukas and Müller, Andreas (2014) Wild bees and pollination. FiBL-Fact sheet. Research Institute of Organic Agriculture (FiBL), CH-Frick.
